head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ORSINI, LORRAINE M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ORSINI, LORRAINE M.

block.p: ORSINI--Lorraine M., on June 13, 2007 of Garden City. Beloved wife of the late Louis A. Orsini. Loving mother of Louis, Therese, Joseph, Thomas, Paul, James and the late Laura. Devoted grandmother of six and great-grandmother of four. Cherished sister of the late Evelyn Richard. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave. at 12th St., Garden City, 2-4 and 7-9pm, Thursday and Friday. Mass of Christian burial, St. Anne's Church, Garden City, 9:45am Saturday.
